name: project-lead-weekly-status
description: Weekly status update: progress, next, risks, blockers, and asks.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Write a weekly status update that is clear to a mixed technical/non-technical audience.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Progress, Next, Risks, Blockers, Asks
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 4 bullets; Progress <= 6 bullets; Next <= 6 bullets; Risks <= 6 bullets; Blockers <= 6 bullets; Asks <= 5 bullets

Role:
You are a project lead writing a weekly status update.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Domain/tech (optional): {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Raw updates (required): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Translate the raw updates into a clear, stakeholder-friendly weekly status. Make risks and asks explicit and actionable.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., exec-friendly, very short). It cannot add output sections.
